nodes.excerpt: Are you tired of sharing unreadable or boring links to others? Now you don't have to. Introducing Dope.Link. A powerful, simple, all-in-one link and bio-page creation tool that puts your content in front of people to maximize engagement and sales.

nodes.excerpt: Firefoo is a sophisticated GUI tool for Firebase Cloud Firestore. View and edit your data in a table, tree or JSON, export to JSON and CSV, and run queries from a JavaScript shell.
nodes.title: Firefoo - Gain power over your Cloud Firestore data with a smart GUI

nodes.excerpt: Fully cross-platform, vendor-agnostic, markdown based note-taking app. With NotesHub your notes truly belong to you and not tight to any particular vendor. All of your data is stored in Git repositories, so you can clone them and manage outside the app.
nodes.title: NotesHub - Fully cross-platform, markdown based note-taking app
nodes.author: Alex Titarenko

nodes.excerpt: Unified all in one personal workflow notion system. Life is full of options and noise. By applying the best systems, you can focus on what truly add value to your life.
nodes.title: Obsidian Life OS - A unified workflow system built in Notion

nodes.excerpt: eezy is your new lifestyle planner! Driven by artificial intelligence, eezy connects you to things to do and new friends to enjoy them with, all based on your psychological profile, preferences, and current mood. Optimize your free time and start living eezy!
nodes.title: eezy - Daily adventures for ambitious people
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: A simple coffee calculator to help you brew a great cup of coffee with whatever measurements you have available. Use grams, cups, fluid ounces, or tablespoons to calculate either water or beans for your ideal brew ratio.
nodes.title: Brew Ratio - A simple coffee calculator to help you brew a great cup
nodes.author: Matt Shwery

nodes.excerpt: Outfunnel's App connector makes it incredibly easy to create deep data connections between all your marketing tools and CRM (Copper, Pipedrive, HubSpot). Not very exciting, but extremely useful if youâ€™d like your sales and marketing people to work together.
nodes.title: App Connector by Outfunnel - Connect your sales and marketing data, deeply and easily

nodes.excerpt: A lot of apps help you schedule your day but very few can help you with what should go into your schedule. We remind you of the small things, like doing laundry or paying your bills, so you don't have to sweat the small things.
